item.title: I've Passed CKAD Exam
item.author: vvelikodny@gmail.com (Vitaly Velikodnyi)
item.description: I’ve successfully passed the Certified Kubernetes Application Developer exam (CKAD) last Sunday. It took me about 1 week to review all thing either I already know or forgot, train different setups on Kubernetes.
